msbt.message: Excuse me, but could you please stop staring at my back? It's rude.<10_4 /> Won't find anything back there, anyway
Hey! I know what you're doing. You can't fool me twice. If you want to talk, my face is in the front.
Seriously, cut that out! Last warning. Instead of looking, why don't you try listening for once?
Did you not get the memo?! Stop looking back there! Glad you think this is funny, kid.

Why, hippity skippity, hoppity ho! Now that you found meI'll say a warm hello!I'm a lucky ol' bunny, yeppity yipper. And here's a little tip You can call me Zipper! Yaaaay! You can clap now. No really, go on. Well, well, isn't this swell! Here you areand here I am to tell you all about my favorite holiday!
I know what you're thinking. No. This is NOT a costume. And don't you go snoopin', got it?

Zippity zap, enough of that.It's almost Bunny Day! Hop-hop- hooray! That's my favorite time to come out and play! Ugh. I've got so much prep work to do. I hope you can keep yourself busy.And guess what! This funny bunny has a Bunny Day secret just for you.
Ready?<10_4 /> Yippity skippity, here it is
The time has come! Let's look for eggs! That's my bunny plan!<10_8 arg="120" /> They're here! They're there! They're everywhere! Find them if you can!<10_7 arg="180" />

Did I make myself clear? Yes? No? Maybe so? Hmm. How about this There are 6 types of eggs hidden around the island, you see.So wonderful ol' you should go look for themand then bring 'em back to wonderful ol' me! These eggs aren't hidden inside buildings, no sirree. My eggs can only be found in the great outdoors! Check the trees, check the rocks, check the water too.Search the sky, search the ground, that's what you should do!
And here's a little something I made for you too!

That's a recipe for a Bunny Day bed. You can craft it with the eggs you find. And now, a big announcement! I sure hope you like thisI've hidden Bunny Day-themed DIY recipes all around the island!The closer we get to Bunny Daythe more recipes I'll hide!If you find and craft ALL the DIY recipes I've hiddenwhy, you'll get a super-di-doopery present from ME! Zippity skippity hoppity hey! It's gonna be the wonderfully wonderfullest Bunny Day!
Also, I have something for ya. Wait a minute! Your pockets are full.Come talk to me when you have less stuff in there. But make sure it's before the end of today!
Hey! Look at you! Ya freed up those pockets of yours. Here you go then!
Well? Didja make room in your pockets or what?Look, kid, I can't give you your present if you don't make some room.

Hippity ho, whaddaya know! Bunny Day is !I promise to bounce right on back to this island on that wonderful, FUNderful day!In the meantime, skipper, don't tell anyone ya ran into ol' Zipper. It'll be a funny-bunny surprise!

You won't find eggs inside any buildings. I haven't hidden them there. Outside's the place! Go there to search for all my eggy fare! Check trees and rocks! Check the water too! And look up in the air!

Don't forget to look for the Bunny Day DIY recipes I've hidden around the island. I LOVE hiding stuff, and I'll hide more recipes every day until it's BUNNY DAY! If you find and craft every Bunny Day DIY recipe, I'll give ya a supery- dupery present, OK!
The time has come! Let's look for eggs! That's my bunny plan!<10_8 arg="120" /> They're here! They're there! They're everywhere! Find them if you can!<10_7 arg="180" />
Hey! Aren't you gonna go find 'em?
Boingity boing! Hello there!It's time for fun, hippity flipper! I'm the lucky yellow bunny everyone callsZipper!Yaaaay! You should clap now.
Hey. What are you lookin' at? This is NOT a costume. I'm a bunny, see?
Snippity snap, forget all that!Bunny Day is almost here. And hippity ho, whaddaya know, I've got a funny-bunny secret for you.
Long story short, kidfind a bunch of eggs and something good might happen on the very best day of all BUNNY DAY! Alrighty then, goooood luck!

Hippity hey, whaddaya say! Bunny Day is !I promise to bing-bong-bounce back to this island on that wonderful FUNderful day! In the meantime, skipper, don't tell anyone ya ran into ol' Zipper. It'll be a funny-bunny surprise!

You're a visitor from another island, aren't ya?Well, this is awkward. You see, I brought some Bunny Day DIY recipes with me todayBut I only brought enough for the folks living here. Real sorry about that, kid.
Boingity boing! Hey there, skipper! It's meZipper!I'm the lucky yellow bunny, and I'm here to saythere's something super special hippity happening today!Yaaaay! Let's all clap! Anytime now.
Do I remember you? Well, of course I do! I never forget a friendly face Especially one I meet in a new place. Looks like you kept my visit a secret. I'm surprised you actually listened
Anyway, my favorite day is finally here! Time to fill this island with lots of bunny cheer! Hip-hop-hooray! Are you ready to celebrate Bunny Day?
Great! Say it with me now
The time has come! Let's look for eggs! That's my bunny plan!<10_8 arg="120" /> They're here! They're there! They're everywhere! Find them if you can!<10_7 arg="180" />
Do you understand what I'm trying to say?You can still hunt for eggs on this special day!Use your time wisely, and try to find the 6 types of eggs hidden around the island.
If you find all six types, I'll give you a funny-bunny reward!
Ya know what, I also have a surprise for someBUNNY very special

And that someBUNNY is you! Here's a Bunny Day arch recipe to say thanks for all you do.Well then! You better hop to it if you're going to find each and every Bunny Day DIY recipe I've hidden. I have a super-EGGStra-special reward for anyone who crafts all my Bunny Day recipes! Now, no time to waste. Make haste!
This is for you! Oh? It seems your pockets are full. How unexpected! Go make some room, and then I'll give you the gift I've selected.
I know what you're thinking. No. This is NOT a costume. And don't you go snoopin', got it?

Zippity zap, that's enough of that. Let's talk about why I'm here To spread lots of Bunny Day cheer! Today is a very special day, which is why I want everyone to go outside and play! I have a wonderful Bunny Day game. Listen close and I'll explain

That's a Bunny Day arch recipe! Go ahead and craft it with the eggs you find.And now, a grand announcement! Are you listening, kid? Whatever. Here it is.Bunny Day-themed DIY recipes are hidden all around this very island!A special prize awaits that lucky someBUNNY who finds and crafts all my Bunny Day recipes. Now, shake that cottontail, and hippity hop to it! I'll be waiting.
Bingity boingity! Hey there, skipper! It's meZipper!I'm your Bunny Day pal, and I'm here to boost morale! Yay! Hip- hop-hooray! That was your cue to clap.
Alrighty then! Good luck out there!

Oh yeah, I forgot to mention something kinda important earlier.Here's the deal If you're ever short by one egg of a certain type, I can help ya out! I'll give you one egg of your choice, and all you have to do is give me of a different type of egg. Bippity bop, not a bad deal, eh? All you need to say is, "Let's trade!" and I'll know what you mean.

Hippity hey, you came up with a new DIY recipe when you found an egg?I can't believe you made your very own recipe! That's EGGScellent! Next you'll be dressing up like a bunny.Hmm, you know how I said I'd give you something neat if you crafted aaall the DIY recipes I've hidden?Well, you don't have to craft the recipes you come up with on your own to get that special present. No need to get your fur in a fluff about those. It's not like they're made by a professional or anything.

Hippity boing, hoppity bing! How's the Bunny Day egg crafting? Let's seeHmm, looks like you haven't done much crafting so far, have you? Sheesh. Thought I'd made myself clear. Now remember, if you craft ALL the Bunny Day DIY recipes I've hiddenI'll give ya a prize! A wonderful, FUNderful prize!I can't tell ya where these recipes are hidden, but I CAN give you a funny-bunny hint. It goes like thisTake a walk down on the beach. Look way up in the sky.The thing you seek sits on the sand. Or perhaps it's floating by?Go on, kid, it's easy to do. Just give it an eggy try!

Boingity hey! How goes the Bunny Day DIY crafting? Let ol' Zipper take a look Wonderful! Looks like you're bouncing right along! Though there's plenty more to find. Here, I'll tell ya where I hid the remaining recipes<10_10 />Somewhere secret!<10_9 />Ah fine, here's a hint for you It never hurts to look UP.

Ya-ho ya-hey! Ya-hippity-dey! Looks like you've been doing some serious DIY crafting! But have you crafted all the recipes I've hidden? Lemme take a lookWell, well! How about that! Looks like you have only left.Not bad. Not bad at all. Keep it up, kid.

Hippity hoppity howdy! Enjoying the Bunny Day festivities?More importantly, how's the Bunny Day crafting coming along? Let your pal Zipper take a look Nice work, kid. Keep up the good Huh?!You wanna know where the rest of the recipes are? I can't tell you that! Sheesh. You kiddin' me here? WellI suppose if you're having trouble, I CAN tell you thisMaaaybe someone else on this island got to them before you? And maaaybe you should ask around. But that's all this bunny is sayin'. These lips are zippered!
Boingity hey! Don't forget to let me know if you make wobbling Zipper toy! I'm telling ya, kid, you won't find a funnier bunny-er toy anywhere!
Let's craft with eggs! Let's craft with eggs! That's the bunny plan!<10_8 arg="120" />
Let's hunt for eggs! Let's craft with eggs! That's the bunny plan!<10_8 arg="120" />
So, didja need something?
I have eggs.
Let's trade!
Never mind.
Huh? What's up?
I have eggs.
Let's trade!
Never mind.
Look, kid, whaddaya want?
I have eggs.
Let's trade!
Never mind.
Whatever you say, kid.
You want to trade eggs, eh. Which egg do you want?
Water egg.
Sky egg.
Earth egg.
Any other eggs?
Never mind.
Here's three more. Which one do ya want?
Stone egg.
Leaf egg.
Wood egg.
Let me see the others.
Never mind.
Back to the first three, eh. Which one will it be?
Water egg.
Sky egg.
Earth egg.
Let me see the others.
Never mind.
So, you want .You've got to give me eggs of the same kind in exchange. Which kind is it going to be?
OK, the !I'm gonna trade you 1 for . We have a deal?
Yep!
Never mind.
Boingity boing! Let's trade eggs!
Let's hunt for eggs! Let's craft with eggs! That's the bunny plan!<10_8 arg="120" />
Let's do this again sometime!
Hold on one hippity-hot minute. You don't have enough eggs.Listen up. You've gotta bring me eggs of the same kindThen, and only then, I'll trade you one egg of any kind you want. You follow?
Whatever you say, kid.
Huh? Hold on a minute! Trading doesn't work that way.See, you bring me of the same kind of egg, and I'll give you one of a different kind of egg. Got it?
Not up for an egg trade, eh? Maybe another time, kid.
Changed your mind, didja? Guess I'll give these back, then.
Boingity yay, let's trade Boingity boo, your pockets are full.Can't give you the egg until you've got the space. Come talk to me when you do.
Ah! Let's see
You brought more eggs! Let's take a look
One, twooo, threeee, four, five, six!Wonderfully wonderful! You have all six types of eggs! Yippity skippity yay!Alright, I'm gonna take of each egg type. Is that OK?
Go for it!
No.
One, twooo, threee, four, five, six!That's all six types of eggs once again! Hippity skippity, look at you!That means a Bunny Day basket is yoursif I can take of each type of egg, that is.
Go for it!
No.
Alright, here you are.
It's a Bunny Day basket!
It's time to celebrate! Here we go
Boingity yay! Hip-hop-hooray! What a wonderful FUNderful egg-filled day!<10_7 arg="180" />
Alright, kid, enjoy the rest of your Bunny Day!
Hold on! By my big bunny ears, you don't have any eggs! Sheesh. Got my hopes up and everything
You gotta collect all six types of eggs, and then I'll give you a fun bunny present!
You know the drill. Collect ALL six types of eggs, and I'll give you Bunny Day basket!
The time has come! Let's look for eggs! That's my bunny plan!<10_8 arg="120" /> They're here! They're there! They're everywhere! Find them if you can!<10_7 arg="180" />
Ta-da!
What's this? You don't have all the different egg types.There are six different kinds of eggs. Find 'em all and bring them to me.
Outside's the place! Go there to search for all my eggy fare! Check trees and rocks! Check the water too. And look up in the air!
Will ya look at that! You've collected each and every kind of egg, butYour pockets are so full I can't give you anything. Come talk to me when you've lightened your load.
What? You just wanted to show them to me? Suit yourself.
What now? Did I HARE you correctly? You crafted all the recipes I hid around the island?! My oh my! I knew you'd try! But you really finished the task, which leaves me nothing left to ask

EXCEPT THIS ONE OTHER THING!Did you really think it'd be that easy? Ugh, kids today have it so good.That's right, I need you to do ONE more thing before I give you your reward! Take this recipe, and I'll explain
This final challenge fills me with glee. You gotta craft a toy that looks like ME! Yessirree! It's a wobbling Zipper toy! Craft this recipe and a super-di- duper prize is yours! Bunny's honor!
Looks like your pockets are full, my friend. Make some room, and we can try again.

That look on your face says it all Did you really complete my tasks, both big and small?! You crafted the wobbling Zipper toy too? Yippee-yahoo! I knew I could count on you!And I promise I didn't forget my promise. Congrats! Here's your super-spectacular prize

It's a wonderfully wonderful recipe for a Bunny Day wand!What do you mean, "Just another recipe?" Sheesh. Lookin' for a little gratitude here.After all this EGGScellent crafting, I think one more Bunny Day cheer is in order! Are you ready?!
You're the winner! Yes you are! Congratulations! You're a star!<10_7 arg="130" />

Hippity hop! The fun doesn't have to stop!The Bunny Day festivities will continue all day today, so go have a hoppin' good time!And thanks for jumping in on my fun Bunny Day festivities. You've made me the hippity-happiest bunny of all.
Uh-oh. I'm afraid your pockets are full to the brim Come back after you've found some items to trim!
Maybe you didn't HARE me the first time, but your pockets are full. Go make some room, and then come back and see me again.
EGGScuse me?<10_4 /> Oh! Right! You're back for the thing I promised. Alright, here you go!

It's the Bunny Day arch recipe I told ya about.Now, I'm HOPPY to see you jumping into the Bunny Day fun, but there's lots more that needs to be done. Can you find each and every Bunny Day DIY recipe I've hidden around the island? I have an EGGStra special reward for anyone who can craft all my Bunny Day recipes! Get goin', kid, there's no time to waste. Search all over the island, and make haste!

That's the Bunny Day arch recipe! Sorry, I couldn't give it to you earlier. Craft one with the eggs you find. And now, listen up! You need to HARE this grand announcement! Are you even listening? Whatever. Here it is.Bunny Day-themed DIY recipes are hidden all around this very island!A special prize awaits that lucky someBUNNY who finds and crafts all my Bunny Day recipes! Now, shake that cottontail, and hop to it! I'll be waiting.
It's the recipe for the wonderful wobbling Zipper toy I couldn't give you earlier. Like I said, kid, a fantastic reward awaits if you craft it. I swear on my bunny ears!
